HomePage.title: Lys Intelligence - AI-Powered 5G Network Optimization
HomePage.description: Professional telecom AI solutions for 5G network operations, providing real-time scalable tools for wireless network reliability and resilience.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Lys Intelligence was founded in 2020, based in Montreal. Our mission is to provide intelligence to automatically analyze performance data and network configuration to efficiently detect and fix network anomalies in a real-time manner.
about.partnering: Our company is partnering with Operations of Canada and USA to build such innovative solutions.

efficiency.title: It's All About Efficiency
efficiency.intro: Lys can be counted as very high and unprecedented efficiency kind of solution. We are not just about the same or less regard. The meaning of our network architectures and their output from the conventional practices to become fully intelligent and automated.

wealth.title: Wealth of New Opportunities
wealth.description: 5G is expected to bring a wealth of new opportunities in the telecom sector.

missionCritical.title: Mission Critical Applications
missionCritical.description: Mission critical applications will need ultra-reliable connection and guaranteed low latency.

futureOps.title: Future Operations
futureOps.description: The Future Operations are already overwhelmed by a data tsunami. They cannot keep up with the additional 5G use cases data.

hero.title: 5G Network Operations Efficiency Powered by Artificial Intelligence
hero.description: Public and private sector stakeholders around the world seek ways to ensure that wireless communications provide the level of reliability and resilience we have long taken for granted from the wireline network. Unfortunately, despite the societal and economic impact of wireless connectivity disruptions, we lack real-time scalable tools and validated methodologies to identify and understand large-scale wireless network outages.

problem.title: The Problem?
problem.intro: Wireless networks experience the challenge of a real challenge in Wireless Operations

kpi.title: KPI
kpi.desc1: No visibility on the KPI degradation for a real-time manner.
kpi.desc2: No sense of urgency to solve the troubles efficiently.

reactive.title: Reactive
reactive.desc1: Faults detected only when they fully surface and customers are impacted.
reactive.desc2: There is a lack of real-time tools to solve wireless network outages.

manual.title: Manual
manual.desc1: Thousands of tickets with very few tools leading to low customer experience incidents.
manual.desc2: We are simply faced that we are ill-equipped to respond.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.desc1: We have developed a software solution to early detect and solve all wireless network challenges.
solution.desc2: We monitor key KPIs in real time for leveraging RAN, Core, and Transport IP.
solution.desc3: We apply Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) methodologies, to identify/detect bad root causes and automate the resolution.

features.one: Open-only Network for network data usage
features.two: Maximize the operational base for end-users
features.three: Maximize the efficiency of the 5G System

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Lys Intelligence?
whyChooseUs.intro: We deliver cutting-edge AI solutions that transform how telecom networks operate and perform.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Cutting-edge AI and ML technologies applied to real-world telecom challenges.

realTime.title: Real-Time
realTime.desc: Instant detection and resolution of network issues before they impact customers.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.desc: Proven solutions trusted by major telecom operators across North America.

results.title: Results
results.desc: Measurable improvements in network efficiency and customer satisfaction.

footer.intro: Transforming 5G network operations with AI-powered solutions for real-time monitoring, predictive analytics, and automated problem resolution.
